marker.comment: Anchored at Tracy Arm Cove, Sawyer Glacier tomorrow
Saw NandS Sawyer, lots of icebergs and whales. At Snug Cove, Gambier Bay
Docked at Auke Bay, leaving for Hoonah tomorrow with Craig
Hoonah, whales bubble net feeding on way, saw bear on dinghy tour
Anchored at Appleton Cove after leaving Sitka this morning - now soutbound!
Anchored at Ell Cove, Baranof Island. Saw bear onshore about 100 yards away!!
Docked at Portage Bay, Kake. Down Rocky Pass today.
Anchored in Rocky Pass, Keku Strait between Summit and Devil's Elbow.
Docked at Pt. Baker. Smoothl passage down Rocky Pass. Humpback event!!!
Docked at state float at Meyer's Chuck
Back at Thomas Basin, KYC, Ketchikan, AK. Visited Punchbowl off Behm Canal.
Anchored at Fury Cove, Penrose Island. Will cross Queen Charlotte Sound 9/17.
Smooth crossing of Queen Charlotte Sound. Now at Sullivan Bay Marina
Moved 7.77nm to Miller Bay in Cypress Harbour after a lay day in Sullivan Bay.
Moved 10.7nm to Echo Bay Resort on Gilford Island.
30.7nm today to Cutter Cove at the north end of Chatham Channel.
docked at Public Float, Port Neville, off thru Seymour Narrows tomorrow.
Smooth passage thru Seymour Narrows to Campbell River
Across smooth Strait of Georgia to Fisherman's Marina, Pender Harbor
Smooth Strait of Georgia again to Point Roberts. Back in USA!
Crossed to La Conner for DF Rendezvous this weekend.
Started to Port of Everett but 44mph winds and 3' waves sent us to Oak Hbr
Continued with flat seas to Port of Everett
